ref: 12282 śataparvaka m. ʻ the white -- flowered dūrvā grass ʼ Suśr., ˚vikā -- f. ʻ dūrvā grass, barley ʼ lex. [Cf. śatáparvan -- ʻ having a hundred joints ʼ RV., m. ʻ bamboo ʼ Bhpr. -- śatá -- , párvan -- ]
B. sabāi ʻ a kind of grass ʼ;
Or. sabāi ʻ the grass Ischaemum angustifolium or Pollindium angustifolium ʼ?
